meanings.definition: A diagonal rib or groin of a Gothic vault.
meanings.sent1: The ogives in the cathedral's ceiling added a unique touch to the architecture.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully designed the ogives to enhance the beauty of the vaulted ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The ogives in the old church seemed to dance in the dim candlelight.
meanings.sent4: The ogives of the vault intertwined like ribbons, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: Visitors were amazed by the intricate ogives that adorned the ancient vault.

meanings.definition: A pointed arch or rib in Gothic architecture.
meanings.sent1: The ogives of the cathedral's arches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The skilled mason crafted the ogives with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The ogives of the arches looked like giant fingers pointing upwards.
meanings.sent4: The ogives of the building's entrance welcomed visitors with grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the ogives showcased the craftsmanship of the architect.

meanings.definition: A curve representing the cumulative frequency distribution of a set of data.
meanings.sent1: The ogives on the graph displayed the data distribution clearly.
meanings.sent2: Students studied the ogives to understand the data patterns better.
meanings.sent3: The ogives on the chart seemed to tell a story of the data points.
meanings.sent4: The ogives on the graph rose steadily, indicating a consistent trend.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained how to interpret the ogives to analyze the data effectively.
